page.title: 15Religions
page.content: Two{churches,}the Church of England (St.Philips) and the Roman Catholic (St.George & St.Teresa) are in the area and other denominations are to be found just outside. There is a flourishing Council of Churches which promotes inter-church co-operation and unity and members of each church make up a working committee. Inter-denominational religious events are arranged on a regular basis when each church takes its turn to host an event.This is particularly true at Christmas and Easter. Social events are also arranged to enable members to meet and on occasions raise finances for some universal charity.
